snippet: Chicago’s Joakim Noah was of the opinion that the Knicks’ three losses against the Bulls might have been a factor.
abstract: Chicago Bulls center Joakim Noah believes that New York Knicks three losses to the Bulls this season may have been a factor in Knicks owner James L Dolan's decision use high-tech audio microphones during games.

byline.contributor: Howard Beck contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Chicago’s Joakim Noah was of the opinion that the Knicks’ three losses against the Bulls might have been a factor.

headline.main: Bulls See Little Value in Knicks’ Eavesdropping
headline.print_headline: Bulls See Little Value in Knicks’ Eavesdropping

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
